import React from 'react'; const Footer = () => { return (
{/* Top section with quote and call to action */}
{/* Left: Quote and Button */}

॥ अंतः अस्ति प्रारंभ ॥

{/* Right: Social Links */}
Follow Me: {/* LinkedIn Icon */} {/* GitHub Icon */}

  • Educational Journey
  • Project Showcase
  • Skills & Expertise

  • Let's Talk

© 2024 Akshay Balte. All rights reserved.
); }; export default Footer;
